subject: Football
Draft and Recruitment (Sports)
lead_paragraph: Percy Harvin, Minnesota’s top pick fell to No. 22 in the N.F.L. draft because of questions about his durability and because he failed a drug test.
snippet: Percy Harvin, Minnesota’s top pick fell to No. 22 in the N.F.L. draft because of questions about his durability and because he failed a drug test.
